attributes.action: Alter the cross country train franchise changes in Dec 2008 to maintain a basic service to  and from congleton as now operates
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We want to maintain the 7.21am and the 8.21am trains to birmingham new street from manchester at congleton as they currently do.  We do not mind if the times are changed to suit a new timetable, but wish to maintain two services southbound during the commutter period, morning and evening.  

We do not want to be forced to drive down the M6 because trains no longer stop at congleton.  

Let us stay off the roads and on the railways as we currently do.

Change the cross country franchise to suit a basic service to and from congletion to Birmingham New street as well as Manchester.

Think of the environment, think of us falling asleep on the motorways, think of the pollution, vote to keep the trains running to and from Congleton.

government_responses.details:
